thread.title: Robin
thread.title_full: Home Zone Furniture reviewed by Robin

author: Robin
title: Robin
text: I am extremely pleased with my experience at Home Zone. Their quality and selection of furniture was superb. Pat, my salesman, was very knowledgeable. He was familiar with different fabrics and styles. He listened attentively then showed me items exactly what I was looking for. He also assisted me with accent colors and patterns. Delivery was easy and right on time. I love my new couch and will enjoy it for years to come! Thanks Pat and Home Zone!
